Buroka makes it safe & easy to buy and sell bitcoin in Azerbaijan

About Us

Buroka Exchange is a start-up based created by a team of young technology enthusiasts from Bucharest, Romania. Since the beginning of Bitcoin and blockchain technology we believed that is the future for a better world, a world with no financial boundaries where people can connect, invest and benefit from a global decentralized financial system.

Our unique crypto-aggregator helps investors all over the world instantly connect to the cryptocurrency markets, thus allowing them to quickly buy and sell Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies using their local currencies, while creating trustful relationships with our users.

Our customers are at the heart of what we do and our purpose is to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business.

As of today we are one of the fastest growing companies in digital currency space, with offices in Bucharest, Baku, Lagos & London.

Our mission is to create a global network of people that are connected and empowered by Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.
